content.text:
# 1951 Rutgers Queensmen football team

The 1951 Rutgers Queensmen football team represented Rutgers University in the 1951 college football season. In their 10th season under head coach Harvey Harman, the Queensemen compiled a 4â€“4 record and outscored their opponents 184 to 114.
Rutgers was ranked at No. 90 in the 1951 Litkenhous Ratings.
